Exaggerate: The claim of 10,000 Philippine communist rebels surrendering may be an exaggeration as the video description mentions the distribution of benefits to 262 former rebels.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as the video in question is from January 2020 and does not provide evidence of the 10,000 surrenders in December 2020.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the video of the distribution of benefits to former rebels is evidence of 10,000 surrenders, which may be a problematic assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation for the claim, as the video is from January 2020 and may not be related to the supposed surrenders in December 2020.
